DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indicator of whether or not the individual ever stopped smoking for more than one day in the past 12 months because he or she were trying to quit.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Discontinuation of the habit of smoking, the inhaling and exhaling of tobacco smoke for 1 day or longer (time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Discontinuation of the habit of smoking, the inhaling and exhaling of tobacco smoke.

Concepts.definition: Discontinuation of the habit of smoking, the inhaling and exhaling of tobacco smoke.

Property.preferredDefinition: The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.:The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.

Concepts.definition: The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Observations and activities relating to behavior, such as smoking and ETOH use.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Approved for Released by DCEG/DCCEPs on 5/09/05. Added property qualifier concept to meet quality criteria as part of caDSR cleanup. mc 7/13/12

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

PermissibleValues.value: Not applicable; I have not smoked cigarettes since my diagnosis.
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Not Applicable Have Not Smoked Since Diagnosis

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Not Applicable Have Not Smoked Since Diagnosis
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.: A response indicating that an individual has not smoked since they have been diagnosed with cancer.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A response indicating that an individual has not smoked since they have been diagnosed with cancer.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: To decline to do, accept, give, or allow something.

Concepts.definition: To decline to do, accept, give, or allow something.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The answer is not known by the person answering.

Concepts.definition: The answer is not known by the person answering.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Don't Know or Not Sure When Smoked a Cigarette

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Don't Know or Not Sure When Smoked a Cigarette
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual doesn't know or is not sure whether they smoked a cigarette.

Concepts.longName: Don't Know or Not Sure When Smoked a Cigarette
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual doesn't know or is not sure whether they smoked a cigarette.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Observations and activities relating to behavior, such as smoking and ETOH use.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF TEXT2
ReferenceDocuments.description: AHB.080 (CIGQTYR) During the Past 12 Months, have you stopped smoking for one day or longer BECAUSE YOU WERE TRYING TO QUIT SMOKING?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: During the past 12 months, have you stopped smoking for one day or longer because you were trying to quit smoking

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: How many times in the last 12 months have you tried to quit smoking cigarettes and stayed off for at least 24 hours (please enter median if participant answers with a range, i.e. "4-5" = "4.5")?
